notification_ringtone_sub: This notification channel is for finishing alarm on alarm/timer mode   Recommend to set this high priority
notification_interval_sub: This notification channel is for beginning and finishing interval
notification_timekeeping_sub: This notification channel is for timekeeping
change_lang_sub: It will change the language you want to use
app_theme_sub: It will change the theme of this app
clock_style_sub: It will change the 12/24 h style clock you want to use
clock_animation_sub: It will change the animation of clock
clock_seconds_sub: It will change visibility of clock seconds
toast_position_sub: It will change the position of toast notification
toast_duration_sub: It will change the duration of showing toast notification
change_log_sub: Let's try taking a look at new feature and fixed bug！
github_sub: This app is open source software
